practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Construction Accidents|Premise Liability|Medical Malpractice|Motorcycle Accidents|Zantac Lawsuits
description:
The attorneys at the law offices of Mainetti & Mainetti P.C. in Kingston, New York, represent victims of personal injury who struggle to recover the full value of their claims from major corporations and greedy insurers. Founded in 1972, our team has a long-standing history of protecting the rights of individuals who sustained harm as a result of another’s negligence. Our passion for justice is genuine, which is evident in the fact that each of our attorneys has devoted their life to holding at-fault parties accountable for their actions by pursuing the maximum amount of compensation on behalf of clients.

Our team knows just how completely an injury can derail a person’s life. When clients turn to us, they are often unable to work. They face a growing mountain of medical bills, and their feelings of helplessness grow every day. In short, these individuals are going through some of the worst times in their lives. Our law office focuses exclusively on personal injury law so that we can devote to each case the time, attention and resources it needs and deserves. As a result of our singular focus, we are no stranger to successful verdicts in cases that involve any of the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Animal bites
  • Premises liability
  • Medical malpractice
  • Birth injury
  • Brain injury
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Zantac lawsuits

The team at Mainetti & Mainetti P.C. understands better than most the importance of a strong attorney-client relationship, which is why we often travel to our clients and always offer free consultations.Once our office takes on a case we become the trusted and compassionate advocate our clients need to guide them through what is often an extremely difficult time.While our verdicts and settlements speak for themselves and contribute to our ever growing list of awards and recognitions, we believe it is our client-centric approach that has garnered the trust of those in our community and sets us apart from other law firms.We take pride in our approach of vigorously litigating cases on behalf of our clients while still remaining accessible and compassionate to their needs.
